pipelet-node.description: Sets a special reporting marker to indicate a successful registration. This flag will later be evaluate in the template and reset to avoid double reporting of a registration.

text-node.description: Updates the profile of an authenticated customer.
This pipeline contains the login procedure specific for the customer account, e.g. order tracking.
Checks the given user name on existence and ends on a named end node to communicated the status back.
Ajax call to handle update of Customer first and last name.
Start the customer registration process and displays the account overview upon a successful registration.
Store entered email address as login and email.
Assigning a "Dummy" password , so as to save and update with the saved password.
The stored password hash becomes invalid when login changes. Make sure password is set whenever login changes.
Converting Auto Login session to authenticated session by making the value to false

decision-node.description: Check if we have a current member by checking cookie, login, and authenication

pipelet-node.description: Sets the locale to default when retention till enabled

text-node.description: Check if we acuisition or retention member by checking the login state
